text:
Nov 13
• Made changes to ResourceDefinitionCategoryPicker #14308
• Add 'Sort by Qty.' filter to inventory items #14313
• Made PR Refactor ProductForm to initialise selected charge item definition directly #14327
• Made PR feat: add configuration for automatic invoice creation after dispensing items #14317
• Created issue care_fe#14316: Make the new Dispense InvoiceSheet feature environment-configurable
• Merged PR care_fe#14327: Refactor ProductForm to initialize selected charge item definition directly
• Merged PR care_fe#14317: feat: add configuration for automatic invoice creation after dispensing items
• Created issue care_fe#14331: "Add Charge Items to Invoice" Sheet UI is broken
Next
• Work on Optimize Dispense Stock: Loading Indicator + Auto Lot Selection
